name: starter-admin-panel
description: Admin panel starter with RBAC, audit log, Cmd+K search, CRUD data tables, forms, auth, and PostgreSQL. Next.js 14, shadcn/ui, TanStack Table, Recharts.
postMessage:
Admin panel installed! Run:
1. npm install
2. npx shadcn@latest add button card input label table tabs select badge dropdown-menu sheet avatar separator switch dialog form
3. Copy .env.example to .env and set DATABASE_URL + JWT_SECRET
4. psql < lib/schema.sql
5. npm run dev

New in v1.2.0:
- RBAC: Role-based access control (admin/editor/viewer) with <Authorized> component
- Audit Log: Track user actions at /dashboard/audit (admin only)
- Cmd+K: Command palette search with keyboard navigation
- Entity Generator: npm run generate <entity-name> scaffolds full CRUD pages

Demo credentials: admin@example.com / admin123 (try editor@/viewer@ to see RBAC)
